Title: EU sanctions Novatek’s FSU vessels
Description: Novatek-owned 354,000 m3 Koryak and 354,000 m3 Saam floating storage units are among the list of 27 vessels sanctioned by the European Union as part of its 14th sanctions package.
Author: JS

Title: Snohvit LNG to be back online on Monday after a weekend-long outage
Description: Equinor is on track to restart its 4.2 mtpa Snohvit LNG plant on Norway’s Melkoya Island near Hammerfest later today after a power outage halted production.
Author: JS

Title: EU reveals 14th sanctions package on Russia, with LNG included for the first time
Description: The European Union has adopted its 14th sanctions package on Russia for its ongoing invasion of Ukraine, with LNG, the sector’s growth and some shipment circumvention loopholes included for the first time.
Author: JS

Title: Gasunie, Vopak consider options to use EemsEnergyTerminal beyond 2027
Description: Dutch gas network operator Gasunie and Rotterdam-headquartered global infrastructure provider Vopak have initiated market consultations to assess the potential of using the EemsEnergyTerminal in Netherlands’ Eemshaven beyond 2027 for LNG, as well as hydrogen and carbon dioxide.
Author: CK

Title: India’s Dhamra LNG terminal to receive its first cargo from Mozambique’s Coral South
Description: The 5 mtpa Dhamra LNG terminal on India’s east coast is poised to receive its first cargo from the 3.4 mtpa Coral South floating LNG plant in Mozambique with the arrival of the 173,400 m3 Kinisis LNG tanker.
Author: CK
